name: Slime Town City Hall (In Progress)
description:
It's your first day working as a receptionist in the city hall of weird Slime Town. Your boss, the mayor, is pretty chill, but, unfortunately, a dated constitutional provision means that if you get ten complaints, you lose your job.

This project is incomplete but you can get a sense of the gameplay.

Made for Procjam 2018. I originally intended to submit this to another game jam that has a slime theme.

How to Play

Basically, you need to solve each person's problem while doing so in a way that fits their personality.

Keys:

  • A to start the game
  • WASD to move through your options (mapping diagram in case you haven't heard of this before)
  • Q to quit
